Posts.EditableText:
Just to let you know that in the next day or two, axeuk.com is being migrated to a different server.

To avoid losing any posts, these forums will be LOCKED just before the move, so that an up-to-date database can be transferred to the new server.

I will post to this thread to keep you informed of the status of the move.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
The forums are now locked while the move takes place.

You should be able to post again by 14th February 2007.

Posts.EditableText: The server move has now taken place, so if you can see this message, you're successfully connected to the new server.
